agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Texas Ports, Select TIME & DATE: 3:00 PM or upon adjournment Thursday, April 4, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Brandon Creighton The Senate Select Committee on Texas Ports will meet to hear invited testimony and conduct any other business deemed necessary by the Chair. If submitting written testimony, please submit 10 copies with your name to the Committee during the hearing. All witness registration will be done electronically. All oral testimony will consist of only invited testimony.
